Message:
I thought the followers of
the Church to be more
of an obedient group that
listened without question...

she actually had a head
on her shoulders.

And she wanted me to use
my powers for helping strangers,

It sounded as though
going with her would be
anything but boring...

As a nun of the Church,
I read the fortunes of
followers who lost their way,

advising them on how they
could solve their problems.

I was out of place for not having
a shred of religious faith in me...

But, my life had never been
so perfect.
